price: E enviamos os ventos fecundantes, e fazemos descer do céu água, e damo-vo-la de beber; e não sois seus retentores.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnā al-riyāḥa lawāqiḥa fa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan fa-asqaynākumūhu wamā antum lahu bikhāzinīna
translations: and We gave it to you to drink
